name: Tide Infecter
text:
When Tide Infecter enters the battlefield, all other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each flooded land on the battlefield.
Flood {2}{b}{b} (During your turn, you may pay {2}{b}{b} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”)
Whenever you flood Tide Infecter, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
